description:
We love you. And you love us, right? That's why we're making the ultimate declaration of love: a new DLC pack! It's better than roses or an engagement ring, because it comes with FIVE romance-themed items to create a den of devotion wherever you want. All for you, boo. xoxo

This DLC contains these lovingly crafted cosmetics:
Box of Chocolates
Heart Archway
Love Lamp
Heart Rug
Love Couch
name: Moonstone Island Designed for Lovers DLC Pack
